gloy 格洛伊, gloze 护短, gloze 出处
gloze 护短, gloze 掩饰错误, gloze 掩饰

list.abs: glozed over the embarrassing part. See Synonyms at palliate ., 文饰尴尬的部分参见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French gloser, from glose 'a gloss, comment', based on Latin glossa (see gloss)

auth_sentence.content: It is not charity to gloze over the sins and sorrows of men.
